definitions.body: ´[[ע]] lit. Le 13:3 + 6 t. Le 13; f. [[עֲמֻקָּה]] of cup Ez Eze 23:32, trench Pr 22:14, Pr 23:27 (all 3 in sim.); [[מִשְּׁאוֹל]] ´[[ע]] Job 11:8 (fig.); pl. [[מַיִם עֲמֻקִּים]] (sim.) Pr 18:4, Pr 20:5.
= unsearchable [[עָמׂקּ]] Ps 64:7, Ec 7:24, Ec 7:24; pl. [[עֲמֻקוֹת]] (Baer [[עֲמוּקוֹת]], van d. H. [[עֲמֻקּוֹת]]) Job 12:22.
